title: Picknation's Budin on Why Bettors Got Brexit So Wrong (Audio)
itunes:title: Picknation's Budin on Why Bettors Got Brexit So Wrong (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Steve Budin, CEO at Picknation and Vice President of Gaming Nation, on the Brexit bookmaking, and why bettors got it so wrong.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
